verseExamples.translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful
[All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds
This is the Book about which there is no doubt
In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful
Guide us to the straight path
The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor

verseExamples.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي جَاعِلٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ خَلِيفَةً
verseExamples.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, 'Indeed, I will make upon the earth a successive authority'
And [mention] when your Lord said to the angels

verseExamples.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ كِتَابٌ مِّنْ عِندِ اللَّهِ
verseExamples.translation: And when there came to them a Book from Allah
This is the Book about which there is no doubt

verseExamples.arabic: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ آمَنَّا بِاللَّهِ وَبِالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ
verseExamples.translation: And of the people are some who say, 'We believe in Allah and the Last Day'
Indeed, I will make upon the earth a successive authority
[All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds
This is the Book about which there is no doubt
This is the Book about which there is no doubt
In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful
In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful
[All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds
This is the Book about which there is no doubt
This is the Book about which there is no doubt
And when there came to them a Book
And those who believe and do righteous deeds
And He taught Adam the names
It is He who created for you
And [recall] when We took your covenant
The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful
And when there came to them
